text: The Bandit's Waterloo is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Bandit’s WaterlooThe Bandit’s Waterloo (The Outwitting of an Andalusian Brigand by a Pretty Senora) and stars Charles Inslee, Linda Arvidson, and Marion Leonard. ==Actors== * Charles Inslee as Bandit leader * Linda Arvidson as Accomplice / Woman at Inn * Marion Leonard as Kidnapped woman * Harry Solter as Police Sergeant * Arthur V.
